Class FieldName¶

class app.field_name.FieldName[source]¶

Bases: object

Enum that contains all standard field names as well as additional ones used in BiBler.

Abstract = 'abstract'¶
Address = 'address'¶
Annote = 'annote'¶
Author = 'author'¶
BookTitle = 'booktitle'¶
Chapter = 'chapter'¶
Comment = 'comment'¶
Crossref = 'crossref'¶
DOI = 'doi'¶
Edition = 'edition'¶
Editor = 'editor'¶
Howpublished = 'howpublished'¶
Institution = 'institution'¶
Journal = 'journal'¶
Key = 'key'¶
Month = 'month'¶
Note = 'note'¶
Number = 'number'¶
Organization = 'organization'¶
Pages = 'pages'¶
Paper = 'paper'¶
Publisher = 'publisher'¶
School = 'school'¶
Series = 'series'¶
Title = 'title'¶
Type = 'type'¶
Volume = 'volume'¶
Year = 'year'¶
_FieldName__all_names = ['abstract', 'address', 'annote', 'author', 'booktitle', 'chapter', 'comment', 'crossref', 'edition', 'editor', 'howpublished', 'institution', 'journal', 'key', 'month', 'note', 'number', 'organization', 'pages', 'paper', 'publisher', 'school', 'series', 'title', 'type', 'volume', 'year']¶
static fromEntryListColumn(column)[source]¶

Convert a entry list column name into a field name. :type column: gui.app_interface.EntryListColumn :param column: A EntryListColumn name. :rtype: FieldName :return: The corresponding FieldName name.

The same name is returned if it is not a valid FieldName name.
static getAllFieldNames()[source]¶

Get all field names sorted in alphabetical order. :rtype: list of FieldName :return: The list of field names.

static iterAllFieldNames()[source]¶

Iterator over the list of all field names sorted in alphabetical order. :rtype: generator of FieldName :return: The list of field names.

static toEntryListColumn(field)[source]¶

Convert a field name into an entry list column name. :type field: FieldName :param field: A field name. :rtype: gui.app_interface.EntryListColumn :return: The corresponding EntryListColumn name.

The same name is returned if it is not a valid EntryListColumn name.
